We're supporting the @EnvAgency Flood Action Campaign.

In England there are over 5 million homes at risk of flooding, with the average cost of flooding to a home standing at around £30,000. 

Do you know what to do in a flood? This EA page will help you: https://t.co/M69rAjeROr https://t.co/kYoMiH24z9

Look! @wessexwater, who last year spent 107,434 hours dumping sewage into local rivers and on 813 separate occasions dumped sewage into our seas, has just applied to the @EnvAgency for a new sewage dumping permit.

But will the EA refuse the application?

https://t.co/nl5a7W7qo0

Did you know 5.2 million homes and businesses
in England are at risk of flooding according to the @EnvAgency

To mark #FloodActionWeek here's five things you can do that could really make a difference! https://t.co/1BFY1X8Sm3
